Question.1: How do I create an account?
Question.2: What should I do if I encounter a bug or error while using the program?
Question.3: How can I reset my password if I forget it?
Question.4: How do I update my profile information?
Question.5: How do I contact support if I encounter an issue?

Answer.1: To create an account, simply navigate to the registration page and fill out the required information, including your email address and a secure password. Once submitted, you will receive a confirmation email to verify your account.
Answer.2: If you encounter any bugs or errors, please report them to our support team by sending an email to medical.center@gmail.com. Please include as much detail as possible about the issue you're experiencing, including any error messages you've encountered and steps to reproduce the problem.
Answer.3: To reset your password, click on the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page. You'll be prompted to enter your email address, and we'll send you instructions on how to reset your password.
Answer.4: To update your profile information, log in to your account and navigate to the 'Profile' section. From there, you'll be able to edit your personal details such as your name, email address, and profile picture.
Answer.5: If you encounter any issues or have questions that are not addressed in the 'Help' section, you can contact our support team for assistance. Simply send an email to medical.center@gmail.com, and we will respond to you as soon as possible.
